ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND($User.Id<> "005300000042h6D",$User.Id <> "005300000042h8H", $User.Id <> "005300000042u6Z", $User.Id <> "005300000042hRr", $User.Id <> "005300000042hHd",$User.Id <> "0051300000BamR7", $User.Id <> "0051B000009Onlt",($Profile.Name <> "System Administrator" && $Profile.Name <> "Honeywell System Administrator" ), OR(AND(NOT(ISNULL( ISE_Customer_Commit_Date__c )) ,ISNEW()), ISCHANGED(ISE_Customer_Commit_Date__c) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You do have have access to edit ISE Customer Commit Date field
